get.summary: Get the payment request digest based on ID.
get.description: Returns the payment request digest based on ID.

get.summary: Get all payment requests digests based on the search criteria.
get.description: Returns all payment requests digests based on the search criteria.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The start of the page offset.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return (default 1000).

parameters.name: approvalStatus
parameters.description: A code representing a Payment Request Approval Status. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to get the available approval status codes.

parameters.name: paymentStatus
parameters.description: A code representing a Payment Request Payment Status. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to get the available payment status codes

parameters.name: vendorInvoiceNumber
parameters.description: Vendor invoice number tied to invoice.

parameters.name: createDateBefore
parameters.description: The payment request create date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: createDateAfter
parameters.description: The payment request create date is after this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: userDefinedDateBefore
parameters.description: The payment request user defined date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: userDefinedDateAfter

parameters.name: submitDateBefore
parameters.description: The payment request submit date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: submitDateAfter
parameters.description: The payment request submit date is after this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: paidDateBefore
parameters.description: The payment request paid date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: paidDateAfter
parameters.description: The payment request paid date is after this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD.
